title: Understanding Welding Pool State Recognition Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Targeting individuals interested in welding quality analysis using vision systems in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Explain at least three criteria for judging weld quality when analyzing weld pool micro-images
Describe step-by-step the image recognition process of a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)-based model
Analyze the impact of Transfer Learning techniques on improving weld pool status recognition accuracy with over 80% precision
Practice data preprocessing using Region of Interest (ROI) image extraction methods in constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
